cross: Cymbidium Eastern Bunny 'Taketori Monogatavi' x Cymbidium erythraeum v. flavum 'Paradise'

measurements.description: Eleven flowers on two 45-cm inflorescences; sepals yellow-green, bronze veins; petals yellow-green, bronze veins, brown-burgundy marking proximal three-fourths, widest at base, narrowing along petal; lip white overlaid green, burgundy stripe center vein distally, additional burgundy marks each side of stripe; column green-yellow, anther cap white; substance medium; texture matte.
